text: The 2016/17 FIS Freestyle Ski World Cup was the thirty eighth World Cup season in freestyle skiing organised by International Ski Federation. The season started on 3 September 2016 and ended on 26 March 2017. This season included six disciplines: moguls, aerials, ski cross, halfpipe, slopestyle and big air. == Map of world cup hosts == All 33 locations hosting world cup events both for men and ladies. {| |- valign = "top" | {| cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="background:#ffffff;
